name: UpdatePaymentRefund
description:
Update details of a customer payment refund.

This tool updates the details of a refunded transaction for a customer payment in Zoho Books. It should be called when you need to modify existing refund details.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization in Zoho Books. Required to access the organization's data.

parameters.name: customer_payment_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the customer payment to be updated.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the customer payment.

parameters.name: refund_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the refund transaction to be updated.

parameters.name: payment_refund_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing refund details: date (yyyy-mm-dd), refund_mode (max 50 chars), reference_number (max 100 chars), amount, exchange_rate, payment_form, description, and from_account_id.

date.description: Date on which payment is made. Format [yyyy-mm-dd]

reference_number.description: Reference number generated for the payment. A string of your choice can also be used as the reference number. Max-length [100]

amount.description: Amount paid in the respective payment.

exchange_rate.description: Exchange rate for the currency used in the invoices and customer's currency. The payment amount would be the multiplicative product of the original amount and the exchange rate.

from_account_id.description: The account from which payment is refunded.
